name: Send A Crossword
description:
Send Postcard with your own personalized crossword to your friends!
With Send A Crossword, you can easily create and send unique crosswords to your friends as postcards or directly through your favorite social apps. Postcards are mailed worldwide.
You just enter the words, and Send A Crossword makes an awesome crossword gift that you can send to anyone you know: your partner, students, friends, family or colleagues.
What are you waiting for... Send A Crossword!
